QuestData.Title: You Must be This Height
QuestData.Description:
You and the Greasemonkeys got this machine up and running even faster than I expected.
The gnome we captured is keeping her mouth shut, but that shouldn't be a problem. I can take it from here.
Let me know when you're ready. I'll crank up this machine to max and we'll finally see what it can do.
I hope it prints gold coins...
QuestData.LogDescription: Tell Gazlowe to activate the device.
